text: Are pizzas always hot tasted great service is outstanding.

text: I usually enjoy ordering from this establishment. However, I was just in this evening (after the Tucson ordinance to wear face masks) and neither the woman at the cash register nor either man preparing raw food were wearing masks properly. ‚Ä¶More

Very nice job!! Great price, pretty good

name: Monica B
text: Great service, delicious pizza. Fast and friendly service! The best neighborhood spot for pizza and salads. Thank you for continuing service through this pandemic. Family owned and operated, highly reliable, definitely recommend!!

text: Delicious Pizza. Fresh toppings. Good cheese. Variety of crusts. Super friendly staff. Good service. Ate it all. No photos.

text: I have recently discovered this place and I love it!! My only complaint is that the last time I ate here, I ordered a large 3 topping pizza and I swear there was literally 3 toppings on each slice of pizza... Very disappointing.... Otherwise very delicious!

text: Very friendly staff. Great tasting pizza and they always put a generous amount of cheese of their pizzas and cheesebread.

However, my parents really liked it, I received very good service and got good value for the pizza (it was only $13 for a large, 1-topping pizza), so I feel very comfortable giving a 5-star rating!

text: Ordered the Hot Wings, they were perfectly cooked and incredible flavor! Amazing customer service, will definitely be ordering again soon!

name: Rob Kull
text: Solid Pizza. Taste almost identical to Mary Saco's Pizza/Tiffany's Pizza in Michigan, for a moment I thought I was back home. Deep dish is made the proper way, square. Hand tossed could use more sauce. Overall the hand toss is 6.1 and deep dish 7.4.

name: Michael Pino
text: Vastly underappreciated pizza! The service is friendly as well as helpful, and there's so many options for whatever kind of pizza that you want to create. Give them a shot, and you won't be disappointed.

name: Dave Allison
text:
10.00 dollars for extra large one top.
Had good flavor and plenty of pepperoni
Took 13 min from order to my hands.
Faster than most fast food drive ins.

name: Nobody Special
text: Friendly staff, delicious pizza and sides. No short cuts taken here with this eatery. Speedy delivery!

name: Joan Murphy
text: Wings were underdone despite being there early for pickup. I was 5-8 mins early and saw my wings sitting in the ready pile. Pizza was great but came here for the highly raves wings since they are award winning.... not so award winning quality for me the day I went in 2/8/20.

name: Juan V
text: Great pizza and friendly staff.

name: Todd
text: The well done square pan pizza with pepperoni, sausage, and extra cheese and the large antipasto salad were both delicious. It was more than enough food for my girlfriend and me and we ended up with lots of leftovers. The service was prompt and polite. There's really no reason they deserve only 4 stars for anything.

text: My husband wanted pizza delivery for his 70th birthday. üòÅ It was excellent!! Added wings and antipasto salad and what a feast. We will definetely make this our favorite pizza place. The delivery guy was terrific. We couldn't be more pleased with the whole birthday dinner. Thank you.

name: Kyle Booker
text: I love Blackjack Pizza. Online ordering is so easy. Delivery is always fast, even on Friday and Saturday nights. Best hand tossed crust IMO. They say 35 mins, but it is always sooner. Keep up the good work!

name: Atticus Zapur
text: The "Pan" pizza just means that it is a thick pizza shaped like breadsticks. So, if you love breadsticks and pizzas,  which I do, then you'll like Blackjack's.

name: Jordan S.
text: Very Friendly and Kind staff- Spilled my ranch in the store and they replaced it and where very cool about it. Pizza good and they are professional. thanks!
